mapper.insert: insert into pg_index (indexrelid, indrelid, indnatts, indisunique, indisprimary, indisexclusion, indimmediate, indisclustered, indisvalid, indcheckxmin, indisready, indislive, indisreplident, indkey, indcollation, indclass, indoption, indexprs, indpred) values (#{indexrelid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{indrelid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{indnatts,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{indisunique,jdbcType=BIT}, #{indisprimary,jdbcType=BIT}, #{indisexclusion,jdbcType=BIT}, #{indimmediate,jdbcType=BIT}, #{indisclustered,jdbcType=BIT}, #{indisvalid,jdbcType=BIT}, #{indcheckxmin,jdbcType=BIT}, #{indisready,jdbcType=BIT}, #{indislive,jdbcType=BIT}, #{indisreplident,jdbcType=BIT}, #{indkey,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{indcollation,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{indclass,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{indoption,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{indexprs,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{indpred,jdbcType=OTHER})
mapper.select: select indexrelid, indrelid, indnatts, indisunique, indisprimary, indisexclusion, indimmediate, indisclustered, indisvalid, indcheckxmin, indisready, indislive, indisreplident, indkey, indcollation, indclass, indoption, indexprs, indpred from pg_index
